name: Advanced Materials World Congress
content: Advanced Materials World Congress (AMWC 2020) offers international interdisciplinary platforms for the students, researchers, engineers, professionals from academia and industries to confer the recent trends of advanced materials and technology. IAAM will organize the 4-days international conference during 02 - 05 February 2020 at Sydney, Australia. Call for Abstracts The congress aims to deliver an interdisciplinary forum on the following key subject areas: 1\. Nanomaterials & nanotechnology 2\. Biomaterials & Biodevices 3\. Electronic, Magnetic & Optical Materials 4\. Structural & Engineering Materials 5\. Thin Films, Materials Surface & Interfaces 6\. Computational Materials & Modelling 7\. Funtional Materials 8\. Energy Materials 9\. Polymer Science and Technology 10\. Composite & Ceramic Materials 11\. Environmental & Green Materials 12\. Electronic Materials
